snippet.title: The Indie Game Legend 3D - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy on Steam: http://tigl3d.com/steam

Explore a mysterious alien base, blast vicious alien inhabitants, and rescue indie game developers in this NES inspired first-person action adventure!
